title: Twandikire
sub-title: Ufite ibibazo cyangwa ibitekerezo? Twishimira kubyumva. Itsinda ryacu rihora ryiteguye kugufasha muri byose ukeneye.
subject: Impamvu

faqItems.answer1: Ushobora gukora konti ukanda kuri buto ya 'Iyandikishe' iri hejuru ku ruhande rw'iburyo. Uzahabwa amahitamo hagati yo gukora konti y’umukandida cyangwa iy’isosiyete.
faqItems.answer2: Dutanga uburyo bubiri bwo gutangaza akazi: ubwa buri wese (ubuntu) n’ubw’inyongera (premium). Gutangaza akazi ku buntu birashoboka, naho uburyo bwa premium butanga uburyo bwo kugaragara cyane no izindi nyunganirizo.
faqItems.answer3: Nimwinjira muri konti yanyu, mushobora guhindura amakuru yanyu mubinyujije ku rupapuro rwa ‘settings’ ruherereye kuri dashboard yanyu.
